camera.headerText: Appraise-It will need access to your camera in order to assess the vehicle.
camera.bodyText: Your device will prompt you for access to your camera.

microphone.headerText: Appraise-It will need access to your microphone in order to record a summary of this vehicle.
microphone.bodyText: Your device will prompt you for access to your camera.

location.headerText: Appraise-It will need access to your location in order to provide an accurate vehicle valuation.
location.bodyText: Your device will prompt you for access to your location.
